story.name: d64e56ec-86b4-4927-9a64-7fba6fe0a9f3
story.title: AFP Videographics Advisory
story.summary: AFP Videographics advisory on Wednesday:OCEANS GLOBAL WARMINGVideographic on melting ice caps. Two days after a climate summit failed to deliver game-changing pledges to slash carbon emissions, the United Nations warned Wednesday that global warming is devastating oceans and Earth's frozen spaces in ways that directly threaten a large slice of humanity.UN-IPCC-CLIMATE-OCEANS3D MOTION VIDEOGRAPHIC IN ENGLISH AND FRENCH. INTERNATIONAL VERSION AVAILABLE.REISSUEAlso available:THE IMPORTANCE OF...

xmlText.p: Videographic on melting ice caps. Two days after a climate summit failed to deliver game-changing pledges to slash carbon emissions, the United Nations warned Wednesday that global warming is devastating oceans and Earth's frozen spaces in ways that directly threaten a large slice of humanity.
3D MOTION VIDEOGRAPHIC IN ENGLISH AND FRENCH. INTERNATIONAL VERSION AVAILABLE.

Videographic looking at impeachment. Top US Democrat Nancy Pelosi Tuesday announced the opening of a formal impeachment inquiry into President Donald Trump, saying he betrayed his oath of office by seeking help from a foreign power to hurt his Democratic rival Joe Biden.
3D MOTION VIDEOGRAPHIC IN ENGLISH AND FRENCH. INTERNATIONAL VERSION AVAILABLE.
Videographic on how human beings respond to a prolonged period in space.
3D MOTION VIDEOGRAPHIC IN ENGLISH AND FRENCH. INTERNATIONAL VERSION AVAILABLE.
Videographic showing the circuit ahead of this weekend's Russian Grand Prix.
SHORT 3D MOTION VIDEOGRAPHIC. INTERNATIONAL VERSION AVAILABLE.
